name: Simple SEO Meta
author: Eliran Biton

sections.description:
Add meta box to posts and custom posts containing 3 fields

  1. SEO title
  2. Meta keywords
  3. Meta description

If SEO title not empty it will override the default page title.

  • easy to use
  • easy to install
  • works with all post types

Multilingual & RTL supported.

We’ve integrated RTL and multi language support, as well as RTL typography support.

Liked Simple SEO Meta?

  • Rate us on WordPress ðŸ™‚

Be a contributor

If you want to contribute, go to our Elirant3 GitHub Repository and see where you can help.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater1. Upload “simple-seo-meta” to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  1. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  2. Edit the fields inside the post or page.

short_description: Edit meta description, meta keywords and title for each page, post, post type.
